message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it's worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I can't accept $10000.  I'm willing to come down to $11000 to make this deal work.  This price is still a good deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to the value I need. Let's see if we can agree on this,  I'm open to further discussion.
